instructions: Identify the overall theme of each video segment from the following list. Consider the mood, context, and purpose of the scene when making your selection.

themes.name: Fast-Paced Action
themes.description: Rapid movement, high energy plays, quick transitions

themes.name: Strategic Play
themes.description: Deliberate positioning, planned movements, tactical decision-making

themes.name: Celebratory Moment
themes.description: Victory celebrations, high-fives, crowd cheering, excitement

themes.name: Tense Standoff
themes.description: Close game situations, high pressure moments, focused intensity

themes.name: Team Coordination
themes.description: Synchronized movements, passing sequences, well-executed plays

themes.name: Individual Brilliance
themes.description: Standout performance by a single player, highlight-reel moves

themes.name: Coaching Moment
themes.description: Instruction from coaches, team huddles, strategic discussions

themes.name: Official Review
themes.description: Referee decisions, replay reviews, rule explanations

themes.name: Injury Concern
themes.description: Player down, medical attention, concerned reactions

themes.name: Crowd Interaction
themes.description: Players engaging with fans, crowd reactions, audience participation
